description: Department of National Defence requisition of helmet components
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Helmet Components
#### Solicitation Number
Solicitation Number: W8485-237324/A

#### Invitation Type
The Department of National Defence intends to conduct a Request for Proposal (RFP) process to acquire various helmet components.

#### Tender Details
* **Type of Tender**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Closing Date**: Tuesday, November 8th, 2022, at 2:00 PM Mountain Time
* **Submission Method**: Electronic submission is strongly encouraged; however, submission via Canada Post, Courier, or other methods will also be accepted.
* **Locations for Delivery**:
	+ 7 Canadian Forces Support Unit Edmonton, AB
	+ 7 Canadian Forces Support Unit, Edmonton, AB

#### Requested Items
The Department of National Defence is seeking bids from qualified suppliers to provide the following items:

* Amplifier (Audio Frequency) (Quantity: 50)
* Cord Assembly, branched (Quantity: 50)
* Microphone Element (Quantity: 10)
* Microphone Dynamic (Quantity: 15)
* Filter, Acoustic (Quantity: 325)
* Test Station, Electrical/Electronic (Quantity: 5)
* Cord Assembly, Electrical (Quantity: 15)

#### Additional Information
* Bidders must be willing to deliver items to 7 Canadian Forces Support Unit Edmonton, AB.
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number, and the NCAGE.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information
Deadline for Questions and Further Information: TBA

* Contact Person: Debbie Bergeron
* Contact E-mail: debbie.bergeron@forces.gc.ca
* Contact Address: 455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7, Canada

Please note that the following attachments are available for download from Canada Buys:
* Solicitation Document: W8485-237324
* Amendment: W8485-237324_Amh002
* Amendment: W8485-237324_Amh003
